thread.section_title: Row NYC Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Could of done better
thread.title_full: Could of done better - Review of Row NYC Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: litiashat
title: Could of done better
text: This was my first time in New York. What I thought would be the best vacation ever since I had done my research turnt out to be not so great I was hit with extra hotel fees I wasn't told about 35 dollars a day for Internet which came out to 119 which took away from shopping my shower head came off while taking a shower and the tv was going in and out for 4 days I wouldn't recommend this hotel to anyone .... the staff was very nice and polite great location but it wasn't worth the money .... sorry
